title: Expert Committee on Longevity Finance recommends setting up of Longevity Hub at GIFT-IFSC - Odisha Diary
content: Expert Committee on Longevity Finance recommends setting up of Longevity Hub at GIFT-IFSC  Odisha Diary
description: New Delhi : International Finance Services Centres Authority (IFSCA) constituted Expert Committee on Longevity Finance, co-chaired by Ms. Kaku Nakhate, Country Head (India), Bank of America and Mr.â€¦
